UK

About
Game developer.  Very much into my games.  Started off on a BBC.  Was initially into graphics.  Eventually saw the light and moved on to gameplay focused disciplines.  I've been dabbling in physics, networking, serialisation, and tools for a while now.  But my first love is gameplay and the associated design.  My goal is to make amazing new game experiences, without burning out too soon.

I co-founded Media Molecule with Alex Evans and Mark Healey to pursue this ambition.

Specialties: All.


Experience
Co-founder / Technical Director
[Media Molecule](None)  
February 2006 - Present
None
Co-founded company with Alex Evans and Mark Healey

Co-lead programming
Game play, physics, tech, tools, network programmer


Education

BSc (Hons) 1st Class, Computer Graphics

About
I am a Senior Game Designer and writer with extensive knowledge of game design, working most recently for Riot Games for their collectible card game, Legends of Runeterra. My primary passion is the gaming industry, which includes writing, producing, developing, publishing, and marketing for mobile/web games. I also have experience working on independent projects, and am a decent Python coder.

I also have a graduate degree in Philosophy and substantial teaching experience.


Experience
Senior Game Designer
[Riot Games](https://www.linkedin.com/company/riot-games/)  
March 2023 - Present
Los Angeles, California, United States
None


Education

Bachelor's degree, Philosophy
